Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has launched two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video.

Title: Microsoft Bing is under EU scrutiny for Generative AI Risks
Description: The EU is requesting internal data from Microsoft regarding Bing's generative AI and potential risks to electoral processes.

Title: EU warns Microsoft to give Bing AI risk data or face fines
Description: The EU is demanding Microsoft to provide information about the risks associated with generative AI on Bing, or potentially face fines.

Title: Users can now remove their content from Google's AI Overviews
Description: Google has provided options for users to remove their content from AI Overviews, with some methods involving trial and error.

Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Rolling Out
Description: Google Ads is introducing AI-powered summaries to provide a concise overview of campaign performance for advertisers.

Title: Order with Google for Food Delivery is being discontinued
Description: Google's food delivery integration service, Order with Google, will be discontinued at the end of June.

Title: TikTok is testing 60-minute video uploads
Description: TikTok is currently experimenting with allowing users to upload videos up to 60 minutes in length.

Title: Microsoft PC Manager Recommends Bing for PC "Repair"
Description: Microsoft's PC Manager app now suggests using Bing as the default search engine as a way to "repair" Windows 11.

Title: EU Demands Data on Bing's AI Risks from Microsoft
Description: The European Commission has given Microsoft a deadline of May 27th to provide information about potential risks associated with generative AI features in Bing. Failure to comply could result in fines.

Title: Users Can Now Remove Content from Google AI Overviews
Description: Google has provided a way for site owners to opt out of having their content included in Google's AI Overviews using methods like 'nosnippet.'

Title: Order with Google for Food Delivery Ending
Description: Google is discontinuing its 'Order with Google' integration for food delivery services like Uber Eats, DoorDash, and Grubhub at the end of June.

Title: TikTok Testing 60-Minute Video Uploads
Description: TikTok is experimenting with longer video uploads, allowing users to post videos up to 60 minutes in length.

Title: Google Introduces Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has added two new crawlers, GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video, to its lineup.

Title: Mikhail Parakhin Joins Perplexity Advisor Board
Description: Former head of Bing Search, AI, and Ads at Microsoft, Mikhail Parakhin, has joined the advisory board of AI search startup Perplexity.

Title: Google Locks Down Support Thread on Image Thumbnails
Description: Google has locked a support thread where users complained about image thumbnails not appearing in search results. Google acknowledged the issue but provided no specifics.
